original_text: And after three months we departed in a ship of Alexandria, which had wintered in the isle, whose sign was Castor and Pollux.
korean_text: 석 달 후에 우리가 그 섬에서 겨울을 난 알렉산드리아 배를 타고 떠나니 그 배의 머리 장식은 디오스구로라

sentences.original_text: And after three months we departed
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 세 달 후에 우리는 떠났다

sentences.original_text: which had wintered in the isle
whose sign was Castor and Pollux
